name: horizontal-blocks
description: Bring Notion-style layouts with blocks side-by-side, resizable markdown blocks that support full Obsidian syntax including images, embeds, and internal links.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && pwsh -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'C:\Users\daniel\Developer\Obsidian Plugins\Plugin-Testing-Vault\.obsidian\plugins\horizontal-blocks' | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path main.js,manifest.json,styles.css -Destination 'C:\Users\daniel\Developer\Obsidian Plugins\Plugin-Testing-Vault\.obsidian\plugins\horizontal-blocks' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
